text: Egha bizir kabar gɨn Ekiam 72 plan gumazir igharaziba mɨsevegha egha pumuning pumuning faragh nguibar ekiaba koma danganir a mangasa nɨghnɨzibar me amadi.(10:1) Fofozir gumazir avɨriba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, gumazir Iesus amadazibar dɨbobonim, a 72 puvatɨ. Me ghaze, men dɨbobonim 70ra. Eghtɨ namba 70, a Luk 10:1ɨn ikɨtɨ, eghtɨ Luk 10:17 uaghan, namba 70 an ikɨ.
